  physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a bird\u0027s-eye view of the Singapore River. There are numerous boats of different sizes in operation. Buildings are also present on both sides of the river. At the foreground of the photograph
 a bridge with suspensions can be seen. People can be seen to be walking and cycling on the roads.
